TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi UserControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 提供簡單的方式建立控制項。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的控制項[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]支援豐富的內容、 樣式、 觸發程序和範本。Controls in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] support rich content, styles, triggers, and templates. 在許多情況下，這些功能可讓您建立自訂且一致的經驗，而不必建立新的控制項。In many cases, these features allow you to create custom and consistent experiences without having to create a new control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 如果您需要建立新的控制項，最簡單的方式是建立衍生自類別。If you do need to create a new control, the simplest way is to create a class that derives from . 這麼做之前，請考慮您的控制項不支援範本，也因此將不支援複雜的自訂。Before you do so, consider that your control will not support templates and therefore will not support complex customization. 然而，衍生自是適合的模型，如果您想要加入現有項目，類似於您如何建置應用程式，建置您的控制項，而且您不需要支援複雜的自訂。However, deriving from is a suitable model if you want to build your control by adding existing elements to it, similar to how you build an application, and if you do not need to support complex customization. (如果您想要使用範本與您的控制項，衍生自改用。)如需撰寫控制項的不同模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[控制項撰寫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md)。(If you want to use templates with your control, derive from instead.) For more information about the different models for authoring controls, see [Control Authoring Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md). A是，這表示它可以包含單一物件的任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板）。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立簡單`NumericUpDown` 。The following example shows how to create a simple `NumericUpDown`. [!code-xaml[UserControlNumericUpDown#Markup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UserControlNumericUpDown/CSharp/NumericUpDown.xaml#markup)] 下圖顯示這個邏輯:The following shows the logic of this : [!code-csharp[UserControlNumericUpDown#CodeBehind](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UserControlNumericUpDown/CSharp/NumericUpDown.xaml.cs#codebehind)] [!code-vb[UserControlNumericUpDown#CodeBehind](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UserControlNumericUpDown/visualbasic/numericupdown.xaml.vb#codebehind)] 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[控制項撰寫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md)。For more information, see [Control Authoring Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md).
